Username: it does annoy me that you mis-label them - they're all (that I've found) labelled as 720p
Date: but a lot of them (this one included) are actually only 544p
Text: which is actually over 40% less pixels. I'm not complaining about the quality - 540p is much better than most - it just seems dishonest to put 720p in the title
column5: and there's no need for it."
